name: sc-tsc
description: Transform a TypeScript project based on sc-types-frontend-* typings to a valid SuiteCommerce module

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && npm run copy
scripts.all: npm run clean-npm && npm i && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test-install && npm run test-run
scripts.clean-npm: npm run clean && find . -name "node_modules" -exec rm -rf '{}' + ; find . -name "package-lock.json" -exec rm -rf '{}' +;
scripts.test-install: cd spec/fixtures/project1 && npm i && cd ../projectMine && npm i && cd ../using-sc-types-frontend-extras && npm i && cd ../tsxTest && npm i && cd ../../../../sample-projects/frontend-simple1 && npm i && cd ../jsx-view-tests && npm i && cd ../projectMine && npm i && cd ../tsx-test && npm i

author: Sebastian Gurin
